ISSUE.TITLE: Can't able to delete shopping cart of any customer
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: beta 430 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Add any product in the cart 2) Go /Admin/ShoppingCart/CurrentCarts 3) try to delete any product of any customer 4) not working expected result is - it should be deleted ![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41533502/77995497-8175a880-7349-11ea-8859-19d836bcbf51.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4441 Added EPPlus licensing config section to the appsettings.json file
